name: Dungeon Rescuer
description:
Discover orc dungeon and rescue your love
Simple casual stealth 2d game where the light is taking the main role.


Inputs:
Full-screen- available in pause menu during the game
Space bar - pause
W,A,S,E - move
E - use
Mouse - look around

I also did a vlog for it:

Game Engine : Godot
Assets by 0x72:  https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
